pageTitle: Bagnon : Bags, Bank, Inventory : World of Warcraft AddOns
textBeforeTable: Optional Files (2) Visit me at jaliborc.com. Please submit bugs and feature requests at GitHub. Have a question? Check the FAQ! Notes Bagnon AccountSearch - Allows you to search trough all your characters items at once Bagnon Facade - Allows windows to be skinned with ButtonFacade Bagnon Scrap - Colors your Scrap on all windows CurrencyTracker - Allows you to track up to 3 currencies on any window You may use these addons to enhance Bagnon functionality: Useful Addons * - Requires the player to login and visit the bank once at each character Databroker support Highly customizable Ability to view the inventory & bank of any character, from anywhere * Coloring based on quality, being a quest or unusable item Flash Find searching (see syntax) Doing pet battles? Check out my latest addon, PetTracker! Overview Bagnon merges all of your bags into three windows: inventory, bank and guild bank. Beyond the basic all-in-one functionality, Bagnon also provides: Tuller jaliborc, by: Version: 6.0.13
